title: [1.7.2][ssp/smp]Ender Book传送书
txt_content:
交通工具统统下岗！传送书闪亮登场。
制作：
Recipe for: Normal Ender Book
Legend: ‘X’ = Nothing, ‘E’ = Ender Pearl, ‘B’ = Book
XEX
EBE
XEXRecipe for: Iron Ender Book
Legend: ‘E’ = Ender Pearl, ‘B’ = Normal Ender Book, ‘I’ = Iron block
EIE
IBI
EIE
Recipe for: Gold Ender Book
Legend: ‘E’ = Ender Pearl, ‘B’ = Iron Ender Book, ‘G’ = Gold block
EGE
GBG
EGE
Recipe for: Diamond Ender Book
Legend: ‘E’ = Ender Pearl, ‘B’ = Gold Ender Book, ‘D’ = Diamond block
EDE
DBD
EDE
Recipe for: Emerald Ender Book
Legend: ‘E’ = Ender Pearl, ‘B’ = Diamond Ender Book, ‘G’ = Emerald block
EGE
GBG
EGE
Recipe for: Ender Writting Tools
Legend: ‘E’ = Ender Pearl, ‘F’ = Feather, ‘B’ = Glass Bottle
INFO: Shapeless
EBF
Recipe for: Ender Writing Tools
Legend: ‘E’ = Ender Writting Tools, ‘P’ = Ender Pearl
INFO:Shapless, Refill
EP 

(Normal: 10 Entries
Iron: 15 Entries
Gold: 20 Entries
Diamond: 25 Entries
Emerald: 30 Entries)


食用方法：制作和删除条目很简单。如果你想要做一个，请确保您有书写工具，至少有一个。站在目标地点打开你的传送书，按“创建条目”按钮，该项目将出现在你的传送书。请注意，如果你是一个服务器上的项目可能需要几秒钟才能显示，因为滞后了。要删除一个条目简单地控制点击你想要的点删除。
最后还需一个作者的mod支持，度娘：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1c0pbjmo

replies.txt_content: 第一次主题帖感觉好紧张
